title: Keegan Bradley Announces Six Captains Picks to Complete 2025 United States Ryder Cup Team
description: Keegan Bradley Announces Six Captain’s Picks to Complete 2025 United States Ryder Cup Team
body: United States Ryder Cup Captain Keegan Bradley today announced Sam Burns, Patrick Cantlay, Ben Griffin, Collin Morikawa, Justin Thomas and Cameron Young as his six captain’s picks for the 2025 United States Ryder Cup Team. The 45th Ryder Cup will tak... [3068 chars]

title: Nvidia Stock May See Its Biggest Post-Earnings Move in a Year This Week
description: AI bellwether Nvidia is slated to report quarterly results after markets close on Wednesday, and traders are prepared for the stock's biggest post-earnings move in more than a year.
body:

title: Teen killed himself after ‘months of encouragement from ChatGPT’, lawsuit claims
description: Open AI to change way it responds to users in mental distress as parents of Adam Raine allege bot not safe
body:
The makers of ChatGPT are changing the way it responds to users who show mental and emotional distress after legal action from the family of 16-year-old Adam Raine, who killed himself after months of conversations with the chatbot.

title: Keegan Bradley’s momentous Ryder Cup player-captain decision revealed
description: Keegan Bradley has chosen not to play in the Ryder Cup as he announced his six picks for Bethpage.
body: Either way, Keegan Bradley was going to shock the golf world with his final decision on whether he would select himself as one of his six captains picks for the 2025 U.S. Ryder Cup team … or leave himself off the team despite playing the best golf of... [4925 chars]

title: Keegan Bradley doesn't pick himself for U.S. Ryder cup squad
description: Keegan Bradley did not call his own name for the United States Ryder Cup team, deciding against becoming the event's first playing captain in 62 years.
body:
